data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
In the minute 4, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jonathan Betancourt (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, David Cabrera is booked for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Juan Delgado for Necaxa drives towards goal at Estadio La Corregidora. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick Necaxa.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio La Corregidora.
Throw-in Necaxa.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 21, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Angel Sepulveda for Queretaro is whistled offside.
In the minute 27, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Queretaro to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the home team a throw-in.
Kevin Ramirez of Queretaro is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Queretaro.
Queretaro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Necaxa.
In the minute 42, Necaxa are coming forward and Juan Delgado gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Santiago de Queretaro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Alex Zendejas.
Great play from Lucas Passerini to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Lucas Passerini with Martin Barragan.
In the minute 47, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Necaxa throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro's Gonzalo Montes has run offside.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Queretaro.
In Santiago de Queretaro Queretaro attack through Kevin Ramirez. The finish is off target, however.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Queretaro.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
In the minute 56, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kevin Ramirez (Queretaro) has received a yellow card from Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Omar Islas is replacing Jonathan Betancourt for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Queretaro make their second substitution with Irving Zurita replacing Omar Arellano.
In the minute 58, Fernando Arce is replacing Ian Gonzalez for the away team.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
Alex Zendejas of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio La Corregidora.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
At Estadio La Corregidora, Idekel Dominguez is shown a red card and sent off.
Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda breaks free at Estadio La Corregidora. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
Eduardo Bravo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Queretaro.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Juan Pablo Meza with Hugo Silveira. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Diego.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 71, Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio La Corregidora.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 75, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a fourth substitution, with Erik Vera replacing Jonathan Perlaza.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Gonzalo Montes (Queretaro) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Necaxa make their third substitution with Alan Montes replacing Claudio Baeza.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Francisco Rivera is replacing Gonzalo Montes for the home team.
In the minute 80, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio La Corregidora.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 84, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
In the minute 88, Queretaro pushes forward through Eduardo Bravo, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Oscar Mejia Garcia will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Santiago de Queretaro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Queretaro throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Free kick Queretaro.
Queretaro's Erik Vera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Santiago de Queretaro.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Juan Delgado with Raul Sandoval.
Alejandro Andrade is on a sub for Alex Zendejas for Necaxa.
Irving Zurita (Queretaro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
